blogs.title: My first thought in the morning.
blogs.author: Jay
blogs.content: Ive always wanted to work on this. A place where id send you blogs which arent really blogs but a read at anytime love letter. Whatever i was creating s halfway done but i think you can atleast read what i have. This is Saturday the 29th of April 2023. Weve just met after a really long while cant exactly remember how long.
